snippet: The Atlantic Coast Conference has fined Louisville and Virginia Tech $25,000 each after reviewing the findings of a Wake Forest investigation that concluded a former Demon Deacons assistant coach-turned-broadcaster leaked game plans to opponents....
lead_paragraph: The Atlantic Coast Conference has fined Louisville and Virginia Tech $25,000 each after reviewing the findings of a Wake Forest investigation that concluded a former Demon Deacons assistant coach-turned-broadcaster leaked game plans to opponents.

headline.main: ACC Fines Louisville, Virginia Tech for Role in Wake Scandal
headline.print_headline: ACC Fines Louisville, Virginia Tech for Role in Wake Scandal
